import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-contact', templateUrl: './list-contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-contact.component.scss'] }) export class ListContactComponent implements OnInit { users: any[] = this.usersService.getUsers() constructor( private usersService: UsersService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
